# tf.keras.regularizers.L1L2

## Class `L1L2`

Inherits From: [`Regularizer`](../../../tf/keras/regularizers/Regularizer)



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/regularizers.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/regularizers.py).

Regularizer for L1 and L2 regularization.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`l1`</b>: Float; L1 regularization factor.
* <b>`l2`</b>: Float; L2 regularization factor.
